videos.title: Impact of Daily Habits on Student Academic Performance
videos.description: A comprehensive study analyzing how study hours, sleep patterns, and social media usage affect student performance using data analytics and interactive visualizations.

videos.title: Machine Learning in Healthcare Analytics
videos.description: Advanced machine learning techniques applied to healthcare data for predictive diagnostics and patient outcome analysis.

videos.description: Complete tutorial on building scalable web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern development practices.
